item.description:
Our Third Vegetarian/Organic Meetup will be on January 17th at 6:00p.m at Pia’s house in Providence (direction below). We have had two great meetings so far, the first at the Garden Grille Café and the second was a potluck at Kevin’s house in Coventry. Each time we had more members attending so let’s keep the momentum going!

Since the food was so incredible at our last meeting we decided to have another potluck, if you would like to bring a dish (optional) please make sure that it is Vegan. I look forward to seeing everyone on January 17th! Please remember to RSVP and feel free to bring a friend or two.

Directions to Ward Residence (141 Standish Avenue):
95 (North or South) to exit 22, follow signs to “Providence Place Mall”

At end of exit ramp can only turn Right

Drive to end of street. Straight ahead will be entrance to parking for Providence Place Mall. Make a U turn at traffic light to the Left. Travel down road (parallel to road you just drove down after exiting 95)

Just before next set of lights, and right after passing Red Cross Blood Center, take a right.

Pass Coca cola plant on Right. At second set of lights turn Left onto Chalkstone.

Pass Shell gas station (on left, first set of lights). Pass Walgreen (on right at second set of lights). At third set of lights turn Right onto Mount Pleasant Avenue.

Fourth block on Left is Rialto Street.

Take Left onto Rialto (there will be a soccer field on your right).

Take first left. Ward household is only house on this block.
White with black shutters, 141 on front screen door, 2 large pines on either side. It is located across from Mt Pleasant high school football stadium (with medium sized island just in front of house).

Pia’s telephone number in case anyone gets lost is 401-521-6133.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Our Third Vegetarian/Organic Meetup is Schedule for January 17th at 6:00p.m!
